pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extreme Value Trawls // Implementation of trawl processes and an extension of such processes into a univariate latent model for extreme values. Inference, simulation and initialization tools are available. See Noven et al. (2018) DOI:10.21314/JEM.2018.179 which can be found on arXiv (arXiv:1511.08190) .
